nodes.text: Iceberg Three was a comet captured in the seventh orbit of Daca.

Prior to the Battle of Mon Calamari, Separatist forces invaded Iceberg III, in an effort to gain a foothold in the system. The Galactic Republic controlled the comet and utilized it as a military outpost. The outpost contained transports, tanks, and a listening post. Decades later, the comet was used as a Galactic Alliance staging ground prior to the Defense of Mon Calamari.
